name: delete_users_id
description:
Deletes a user. By default this will fail if the user
still owns any content. Move their owned content first
before proceeding, or use the `force` field to delete
the user and their files.

notify.description:
Whether the user will receive email notification of
the deletion

force.description:
Whether the user should be deleted even if this user
still own files

$ul: **context_info**: A free-form object that contains additional context
**help_url**: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.
**message**: A short message describing the error.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
**status**: The HTTP status of the response.
